notes.name2: git status        -check status of working tree
notes.name5: git pull      -pull latest from remote repository
notes.name6: git clone     -clone repository into a new directory
notes.name10: git add .    -adds a change in the working directory
notes.name11: git commit -m            -create a new commit containing the current contents of the index
notes.name12: git push origin HEAD     -push the current branch
notes.name13: git add. > commit -m > push origin   -all one after the other in order to publish on Github
notes.name8: code .    -opens the folder with visual studio
notes.name9: Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope LocalMachine Unrestricted >>>use on PowerShell to run the .json server
